title: jordanlee127
author: jordanlee127
content: Yummy Profit - Indicator Trading Signal“Are you tired of looking at candlestick charts all the time to find yourself the perfect entry point, and the best one to day trade?”This is a very good and useful application that I would recommend to everyone, everyone can download and try it for free with 5 indicator alerts, if you have more needs, please upgrade to the premium version.Website: www.yummyprofit.comDownload on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.goofinity.yummy&pli=1Download on Apple Store: https://apps.apple.com/vn/app/indicator-trading-signals/id1517739896?lHow will Yummy Profit app help you?You can’t get better in trading after one day learning about it, but you can reduce your workload and time by watching the charts all day unless you’d love to do so. To solve the problem that might be bothering you for so long, Yummy Profit can help you with tracking market jobs!As the market movement tracking (or market scanner) application, you are now alerted to all the bullish and bearish of the market and be noticed through phone, email, SMS or telegram channel. With the technical indicator that sends real-time information through the set-up, Yummy Profit will stop you from fear of missing out on any trading opportunities and show you the “gold-moment” of making decisions.The App has support for the Cryptocurrency, Forex, Commodity, and Stock markets.MACD, MA, EMA, RSI, BB, ATR, Ichimoku, and Price Action are some of the indicators that are integrated into it. Other popular and advanced techniques include action and other popular and advanced strategies (combination of many indicators). The software lets the trader select time periods such as M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, and D1. Features on Yummy Profit?Yummy Profit is an application that allows you to set an alert or notification to show you real-time conditions of a technical indicator (indicator) or a trading strategy (strategy). We support and help to grasp the market quickly and in a timely manner without monitoring the screen, or candlestick chart continuously.The application has integrated for Forex, cryptocurrency and commodity markets (gold, silver, oil), allowing traders to choose time frames such as: M15, M30, H1, H4, D1 and customize the indicator/strategy configuration accordingly. Some indicators are integrated in the application:MACD: output notification when MACD line crosses signal line.Price crossover MA: output notification when price crosses MAMA crossover: output notification when 2 MA lines cross each otherPrice crossover EMA: Output notification when price crosses EMAEMA crossover: output notification when 2 EMA lines cross each otherRelative Strength Index (RSI): output notification when RSI crosses down/crosses to 30 or 70 line.RSI divergence: output notification when RSI divergence appearsStochastics RSI: output notification when 2 lines K and D intersectBollinger Band: output notification when price crosses above, middle, and below of Bollinger bandSuper Trend (ATR): output notification when price crosses ATR StopsIchimoku: output notification when the price cuts ichimoku clouds; ichimoku clouds change color; the price cuts the baseline, or the conversion line cuts the base linePrice Action & Candlestick Patterns: Doji, Marubozu, Spinning Tops, Shooting star, Inside bar, pin bar, Hammer & Hanging Man, Morning star & Evening star, Bullish Engulfing & Bearish Engulfing, Tweezer Bottom & Tweezer TopAnother great feature, is that you can receive signals through channels like app notification, email, SMS and your telegram channel.Yummy Profit provides free users with features and services including: User can use up to 5 alert channels.User can use the alerts via mobile notification and email notification.User can use the "indicator analysis summary" feature on the M15 timeframe.User can use the "Indicator Market Scanner" feature on the M15 timeframe.Tracking prices and market trends.For premium users, you can use all the features available on the yummy profit app, including:User gets access to up to 30, 60 and 100 alert channels.Users can edit the configuration of technical indicators and trading strategy. For example, for the RSI indicator, the user can edit the RSI length, edit the default alert thresholds of 30 and 70.Users can use alerts via 4 channels: mobile notification, Email, SMS and telegram.Users can use the "Market Scanner" feature to scan the market with all timeframes including: M15, M30, H1, H2, H4, H6, H12, D1.Users can use the "Indicator analysis Metric" feature to view the entire market trend report results and report details of each technical indicator with all timeframes including: M15, M30, H1, H2, H4 , H6, H12, D1.Support 24/7.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: If I get this correctly, this is not a signal about luring newbie traders to pay and helping them to trade? Because that is why most newbie traders fail in the beginning, depending on signals from people that do not care about the newbie trader's money than for their own pocket. This is an indicator having more features than exchanges? Like on the exchanges that I am using, I can not see RSI at 30 or 70 to send me notification, only the notifications that I can get are the prices that I set.Quote from: jordanlee127 on November 10, 2022, 04:55:32 AMRelative Strength Index (RSI): output notification when RSI crosses down/crosses to 30 or 70 line.Using this as an example. Can't I be able to set the overbought or oversold RSI myself? Like for me to be notified at 70, 80 and 90 for overbought market, and at 30, 20 and 15 for oversold market?

comments.author: jordanlee127
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on November 10, 2022, 06:10:06 AMIf I get this correctly, this is not a signal about luring newbie traders to pay and helping them to trade? Because that is why most newbie traders fail in the beginning, depending on signals from people that do not care about the newbie trader's money than for their own pocket. This is an indicator having more features than exchanges? Like on the exchanges that I am using, I can not see RSI at 30 or 70 to send me notification, only the notifications that I can get are the prices that I set.Quote from: jordanlee127 on November 10, 2022, 04:55:32 AMRelative Strength Index (RSI): output notification when RSI crosses down/crosses to 30 or 70 line.Using this as an example. Can't I be able to set the overbought or oversold RSI myself? Like for me to be notified at 70, 80 and 90 for overbought market, and at 30, 20 and 15 for oversold market? These are signals based on technical indicators, and it is not for newbies. This application is for traders who already know about technical indicators to apply it, helping traders save time and monitor the market faster.For your example, you can set the indicator to receive a signal every time the RSI crosses the 30 or 70 lines, or you can adjust this to suit your strategy.You can download the app and try it out, it's free.
